title: New: Essáy & CoMa – Deceptive
body:
Being hyped is one thing, consistently churning out track after track of innovative, engrossing music is another entirely.

This new cut from Germany’s **Essáy** well and truly backs up the recent buzz surrounding the producer, cementing him as one of the finest electronic musicians of 2012. Featuring guest vocals from **CoMa** and a guitar sample courtesy of Australia’s **The Jezabels**; in short, this track is intoxicatingly beautiful.

 [Essáy & CoMa – Deceptive](http://soundcloud.com/essayessay/essay-and-coma-deceptive) by [ESSÁY.](http://soundcloud.com/essayessay)
